help-file.title: TOGGLE
help-file.content:
Syntax: toggle (displays current toggle status) toggle <option> (change current toggle status for option)
This command is used to change the current state of the options your character may use. The default for all new characters is to have the majority of these options set to OFF. More comprehensive help may be found by typing "help <toggle_optionname>". The following options may be set:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- STATUS of toggles. -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Tell : ON | Brief Mode : ON | No Locate : OFF SmartPrompt : OFF | Compact Mode: OFF | Wimpy Level : OFF Shout : ON | Echo : ON | Vicious : OFF Petition : ON | Paging : OFF | Save Notify : ON Anonymous : OFF | Screen Size : 24 | Terminal : ANSI Map : ON | Old SmartP : OFF | Show Titles : ON Battle Alert: OFF | Kingdom View: OFF | Ship Map : OFF Take : ON | Terse Battle: OFF | QuickChant : ON Project : OFF | AFK : OFF | NChat : ON Hint Channel: OFF | Group Needed: OFF | Showspec : ON Web Info : OFF | -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
